name: NG Gallery
body:
ngGallery ========= Angular is only dependency (no jQuery). #### Example Check out [the live demo](http://demo.jankuri.com/ngGallery/) Install ------- #### With bower: $ bower install ngGallery #### Example Configuration #### app.js ```js angular.module('app', ['jkuri.gallery']). controller('Ctrl', function($scope, $document) { var self = this; self.images = [ {thumb: 'images/thumbs/1.jpg', img: 'images/1.jpg'}, {thumb: 'images/thumbs/2.jpg', img: 'images/2.jpg'}, {thumb: 'images/thumbs/3.jpg', img: 'images/3.jpg'}, {thumb: 'images/thumbs/4.jpg', img: 'images/4.jpg'}, {thumb: 'images/thumbs/5.jpg', img: 'images/5.jpg'}, {thumb: 'images/thumbs/6.jpg', img: 'images/6.jpg'} ]; } ); ``` #### index.html ```html ngGallery
``` That's all.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
